name: Shreya
text: Lately, I’ve been feeling quite overwhelmed. Even though it’s still early in my pregnancy, my emotions are all over the place. Some moments I feel happy and excited, and the next moment, I just want to cry for no reason. I’m constantly anxious — wondering if everything is okay, if I’m doing things right, or if I’m ready for this change. The tiredness and hormonal shifts are making it hard to focus, and sometimes I feel a bit disconnected from myself. I know it’s all part of the process, but mentally it’s been tougher than I expected.
ai_supportive_reply: It’s completely normal to feel this way—your body and mind are adjusting. You’re not alone, and you’re doing great. Take gentle breaks, breathe, and remember you’re strong and loved.
